quest_desc.qdesc: 타라의 특훈 1단계! 요즘 잘나가는 소서리스들의 필수품인 매직 마스터 시험을 보라고 하는데… 실기 시험을 보기 전에 일단 필기 시험에 도전해보자. 퀴즈 형식의 퀘스트. mq119완료후 수행 가능.

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
Do you wish to take the Magic Master exam?
Speak toSorceress Tara if you are confident of passing.

$Sorceress Tara${action:Talk}
Congratulations to you!
I believe you are done with your probation. Yea?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Why do I have so much responsibilities...</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorceress Tara$
Don't show me that long face of yours. Master Sorceress Cynthia has already approved your official sorceress status. You should be happy.

$Sorceress Tara$
You should study hard now since Master Sorceress Cynthia has accepted you as her disciple.
I believe that you already possessed the Magic Master License. Should we begin practicing some higher magic?

$Sorceress Tara$
What?! You should have obtained the Magic Master License by now. And, two or three magic licenses at least!

$Sorceress Tara$
You must have been wasting your life on something not meaningful....

$Sorceress Tara$
You really need to take it more seriously. Lady Cynthia has asked me to improve your skills within a week or else she won't accept responsibility for anything. Have you seen her smile? It's scary...

$Sorceress Tara$
You must prove that you have your basics mastered by obtaining the Magic Master License.

$Sorceress Tara$
The exam consist of written and field examination. First, let us study the history of the Trinity for your written examination.
<html>$Master License - Written Exam$</html>

$Sorceress Tara$
Please pay attention. Do you want me to treat you like Master Sorceress Cynthia does? I know your mind is blank right now but I'll try recap on the history.

$Sorceress Tara$
Choose a topic and I'll try giving you nice and short version of it!

$Sorceress Tara$
Back in our darkest days, there's a Sage once lived to have received revelations from the Goddess. His guidance and knowledge help strengthened society and humanity.

$Sorceress Tara$
The Sage was a wise man, welcomed by many but not all. The Black Dragon attempted to slay him because of his influence and war broke out between them.

$Sorceress Tara$
The Black Dragon backed off eventually but both were gravely wounded. The Sage left a Vision Orb and his Sage's Staff upon his death. They are kept for our future generations to know his prophecies..

$Sorceress Tara$
All these while, you have been risking your life to to protect these legendary artifacts.
Hmm..whose snoring sound is this?

$Sorceress Tara$
Cleric Jake and Lady Marian are the only two disciples of the Sage.

$Sorceress Tara$
Lady Marian learnt new spells through the Sage's knowledge. Lady Marian created her Ancient Magic before the Goddess created the world and even before mana existed.

$Sorceress Tara$
Lady Marian has warned Jake on practicing Divine Magic but Jake refused to listen. This is why we have sorceresses and clerics which are two worlds apart.

$Sorceress Tara$
What I do know now is that, magic that is used by the sorceresses is based on Ancient Magic that Lady Marian created. Marian's Shrine in Blizzard Plain was built in her name. Too bad, many monsters are residing in the area now.

$Sorceress Tara$
With the absence of the Sage, The Black Dragon returned from his healed wound and brought destruction across the continent. Many died.

$Sorceress Tara$
Heroes from all over the world gathered to form the Dragon Raid in order the bring the Black Dragon down. Lady Karacule, was once a member of the Raid.

$Sorceress Tara$
Lady Karacule brought the Black Dragon down after an epic battle. She was badly wounded in the fight and eventually retired from the Trinity and now lives in Lotus Marsh.

$Sorceress Tara$
Lady Marian was surpassed by Lady Karacule. Her family was famous for their spells, but after participating in the Dragon Raid, she became legendary.

$Sorceress Tara$
Lady Karacule's family all possess formidable powers and their power is still unrivaled until now.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Please move on to the next story.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Sorceress Tara$
Lady Karacule is still the master of all sorceresses. We have to meet her someday for your training. It's very important. Please do not gamble away your money. You'll need it.

$Sorceress Tara$
Are you sure? You are telling me that you can master everything when you are asleep. Hah hah!

$Sorceress Tara$
Good! Speak to Lady Cynthia for the written exam.
You'll have to retake it if you just answer one wrongly.

$Sorceress Tara$
I feel bad about this seriously.
Come back to me if you need more stories!

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
You are interested in Magic Master exam?
Speak to Sorceress Tara if you are confident in passing.

$Sorceress Tara${action:Talk}
You need me to repeat once more? Hah hah! I knew it!

$Sorceress Tara$
Choose a topic and I'll try to give you a nice and short version!

$Sorceress Tara$
Back in our darkest days, there's a Sage once lived to have received revelations from the Goddess. His guidance and knowledge help strengthened society and humanity.

$Sorceress Tara$
The Sage was a wise man, welcomed by many but not all. The Black Dragon attempted to slay him because of his influence and war broke out between them.

$Sorceress Tara$
The Black Dragon backed off eventually but both were gravely wounded. The Sage left a Vision Orb and his Sage's Staff upon his death. They are kept for our future generations to know his prophecies..

$Sorceress Tara$
All these while, you have been risking your life to to protect these legendary artifacts.
Hmm..whose snoring sound is this?

$Sorceress Tara$
Cleric Jake and Lady Marian are the only two disciples of the Sage.

$Sorceress Tara$
Lady Marian learnt new spells through the Sage's knowledge. Lady Marian created her Ancient Magic before the Goddess created the world and even before mana existed.

$Sorceress Tara$
Lady Marian has warned Jake on practicing Divine Magic but Jake refused to listen. This is why we have sorceresses and clerics which are two worlds apart.

$Sorceress Tara$
What I do know now is that, magic that is used by the sorceresses is based on Ancient Magic that Lady Marian created. Marian's Shrine in Blizzard Plain was built in her name. Too bad, many monsters are residing in the area now.

$Sorceress Tara$
With the absence of the Sage, The Black Dragon returned from his healed wound and brought destruction across the continent. Many died.

$Sorceress Tara$
We have to gather heroes from all over the world to form the Dragon Raid in order to defeat the Black Dragon. The living legend, Lady Karacule, was a key member of the Raid.

$Sorceress Tara$
Lady Kassandra defeated him after a long battle. She retired from the Trinity as she was injured in the battle and now dwells in Lotus Marsh. It's very unfortunate.

$Sorceress Tara$
If the origin of our Trinity was Lady Marion, then the peak was Lady Karacule. She came from a family well known of its magic, but only became a legend after participating in the Dragon Raid.

$Sorceress Tara$
Lady Kassandra power was unbeatable despite the fact that sorceresses of her family all possess incredible power.

$Sorceress Tara$
Well, to meet the Master of all Sorceresses Lady Kassandra, the journey is an important part of our training, if you had known it earlier you would not have gamble away your traveling money

$Sorceress Tara$
Are you sure that you had master everything even thou you had slept through half of that?

$Sorceress Tara$
Go to Lady Cynthia and take the written exam.
Be careful! You have to retake the exam even if you answered one wrong

$Sorceress Tara$
I've got a bad feeling about this.
Come back anytime if you want to review again!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I would wish to take the Magic Master written exam!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Cynthia${action:Talk}
What are you up to right now? Didn't I told you to study?

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
Ah.. That's cute, my little empty-headed student wants to take the exam?

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
You sure you want to embarrassed yourself like this? Really?

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
Well, since you really want. Fine. But do remember that one wrong answer, and you have to start all over. Sorceress Tara would be able to you study and i bet you will. Now, you really want to take the exam right now?

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
Then we'll begin the Magic Master written exam.
Listen to my questions carefully.

$Magic Master Written Exam Sheet$
Which of the following is the magic that our powers are based in?

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
Hmm.. Your lucky, let see how long this last. Good Guess thou.

$Magic Master Written Exam Sheet$
Which is the Dragon that fought with the Sage long ago?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Correct, let's move to the next question!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
I mean, given how powerful and famous the Black Dragon is in history, you would have being a complete idiot if you pick others. At least you got some common sense.

$Magic Master Written Exam Sheet$
The founder of the Astral Trinity is also the disciple of the Sage. Who is it?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I cheated? No way! Show me the next question!</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
I am surprise that you even remembered Lady Marion's Name.
You're not cheating, are you?

$Magic Master Written Exam Sheet$
Which of the following is the sorceress heroine of the Dragon Raid?

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
You would not forget Lady Karacule if you should be a real sorceress. She is the most noble sorceress among us.

$Magic Master Written Exam Sheet$
Which of the following place is the place where Lady Karacule goes after retirement?

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
Yes, Lady Karacule is now in the swamp of Lotus Marsh. A place that you have not been to yet, but one day you'll get there. Well, seems that you had made it to the last question!

$Magic Master Written Exam Sheet$
Who is the most beautiful sorceress among all?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Go to Sorceress Tara and learn more.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
What?! You mean you don't know this? Go to Sorceress Tara and study till you dream about it!

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
I knew it! My dear student has a stone head indeed.

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
Oh my god!
You actually passed the exam!

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
Ermm, not too bad for your written exam...Now, you would need to pass the practical exam.

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
It's basically a test to assess your ability in applying magic in different situations. Ok, here it is!

$Master Sorceress Cynthia$
Clear Frost Wind Forest.
Hmm... You would probably find it simple.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Talk to Sorceress Tara
journal.contents:
You've asked for some special training from Sorceress Tara, go to her and get started!

Mana Ridge → Sorceress Tara
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Sorceress Tara for special training.

journal.title: Talk to Cynthia
journal.contents:
Go to Master Sorceress Cynthia to take the written exam. If you should forget about the content, go back to Sorceress Tara and learn more.

Mana Ridge → Master Sorceress Cynthia
journal.todo_msg: Visit Cynthia with regards to the exam.
